title: GetMessage (Method)
text:
METHOD GetMessage : CharBufferPtr
Returns the message text, that has been configured for the alarm. The result
is a pointer to the buffer, where the message text is stored
Please remark: This function is accessing localization information and is therefore not recommended for calls from realtime tasks

rows.Name: stringType
rows.Comment:
A __SYSTEM.TYPE_CLASS indicating, which type of string has
to be retrieved
